                                   +----jtelos.IndividualAccessedAsAnAttributeException
public class IndividualAccessedAsAnAttributeException
extends TelosException
Thrown when a query that is applicable only to an attribute is done on an individual. E.g., this exception is thrown when an individual is queried for categories.

See Also:
Individual, Attribute

IndividualAccessedAsAnAttributeException(String, String)

IndividualAccessedAsAnAttributeException 
 public IndividualAccessedAsAnAttributeException(String telosName,
                                                 String errorMessage)
